full_text:
Would’ve been dope if the Reds didn’t have to start the season with the defending WS champs, a team that spanks us always, & then the two California super teams in a year where we traded/let walk half our lineup 

That would’ve been DOPE

When do they put in a salary cap so teams like this can’t be assembled though on the real? 

I’ll gladly root against the Dodgers at all times out of pure jealousy. Must be nice fielding 9 men worth a damn at all times.
